page.title: 10WEST COKER LAW & ORDER
page.content: THE POLICEMAN IN OUR AREA HAS BEEN IN THE POLICE FOR 10 YEARS,HE SERVED 4 YEARS IN MANCHESTER POLICE AND SO FAR SERVED 6 YEARS IN AVON & SOMERSET CONSTABUALRY.HE WORKS IN THE YEOVIL DIVISION. WHEN HE IS OFF DUTY SOKE SUB HAMDON OR CREWKERNE OR YEOVIL POLICE DEAL WITH THE MATTER. THE POLICE GIVE HIM A VAN TO RUN AROUND IN,HE KEEPS THINGS LIKE ALCHOMETER,TRUNCHEON,TAPE MEASURE,A BIG TORCH,FIRST,AID EQUIPMENT,DOG LEAD AND COLLAR,CONES AND A POLICE RADIO WHICH HE NEEDS TO CONTACT THE POLICE STATION.HE HAS A LOG BOOK TO RECORD HOW MANY MILES HE DOES AND HE KEEPS A RECORD OF WHERE HE GOES EACH WEEK.
